review_data.title: Gerold-Burger is a must
review_data.content: One of the best burger I’ve ever had. Just delicious and made with love! Thanks a lot for that to the cook and the adorable lady on the front-desk 😁 Gerold-Burger is a must 🤤🍔

review_data.title: Exciting pasta!
review_data.content: We had the tortellini and the spaghetti nr1 (love that name)We were very pleased with the pastas served. Fresh taste. Real home made craftsmanship. Atmosphere and location highly recommended.

review_data.title: Scenic gem
review_data.content: Hidden restaurant popular with locals. There are dozens of colorful umbrellas hanging in the alley, great for pictures. My burger was great and my family enjoyed their pasta. The waiter was very helpful and friendly. Must go if you are in Zurich.

review_data.title: Cool place to eat
review_data.content: These place drew us in because of the umbrellas hanging over the ally. The food was good and the people were nice.

review_data.title: Not Your Typical Swiss Meal!
review_data.content: I travel to Zürich frequently on business, and look forward to a great meal after working all day. This trip, I thought I’d switch it up from the typical Swiss meal of fondue or sausages, etc. It was a rainy Monday night, and wanted to...More

review_data.title: Bester Burger
review_data.content: Der perfekte Snack nach einen gelungenen Abend. Der Burger während/nach dem Ausgang ist eine pflicht!

review_data.title: Amazing experience!
review_data.content: The service and food were great. Mandy made us feel right at home with here corky humor. Ask her anything.

review_data.title: cool ambiance, good food

review_data.title: Best burger at night
review_data.content: If you feel for a burger after clubbing, this is the right place to go! Its usually open when their club Hive is open, which is next to it.

review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: Came here for lunch with business colleagues. Sat outside underneath the umbrellas. Noticed it was a very popular place; fortunately we had booked ahead. Selected from the daily menu. Food was very well cooked and extremely tasty. Will return.

review_data.title: Umbrella place
review_data.content: This is one of the most insta-famous place, you cant miss clicking pictures here. Guess it's open only in the evenings, so I could not enjoy their food, but the place looked pretty serene

review_data.title: Great burger

review_data.title: best burger u can get at night...

review_data.title: This is my favourite in Zurich
review_data.content: This is the most laid back place and the food is just great, anything they cook is just so good. I love the atmosphere just because it is so relaxed and so not Zurich, great place.

review_data.title: Cool Location, Food and Service
review_data.content: I really like the concept. No menu card - all meals are written on a mirror. So, you easy build a cool relationship with the service staff, that is very friendly, competent and cool. It‘s my favorite location in that area for lunch.

review_data.title: Loved the food and friendly staff
review_data.content: This place was surprising. No menu, which I liked. They show you what the meal choice is (pasta variety when I was there). The veal tortellini we had was excellent. It was so good we decided to have a 2nd meal of the spinach tortellini....More

review_data.title: Selbstgemachte Pasta

review_data.title: Frische Pasta, Burger, Salate

review_data.title: A very good restaurant with a particularly relaxed style
review_data.content: First of all: I just like the style of the restaurant -- and I like the dishes. They are different from what you get usually. It's a cool refresh to the Zurich's restaurant landscape.

review_data.title: Bester Burger in Zürich

review_data.title: friendly and not complicated at all

review_data.title: Alles stimmt!
review_data.content: Well you can have a burger with a view in prime tower. Good burger by the way!!! In this restaurant you get an equally good burger without a view but with authentic service, a nice audience and at a reasonable price. Try the hibiscus tea!

review_data.title: Mittagessen (super Burger)

review_data.title: Never again!
review_data.content: The food was just average, the waiter incompetent and incredibly unfriendly. Didn't want to inform us about the menu nor pay any attention. We felt very unwelcome.

review_data.title: Eat where the locals eat
review_data.content: This is a quirky restaurant in Hardbruke, West Zurich in amongst an area that is essentially industrial. The shops are all housed in shipping containers and they are all unique. Clothing and homewares mainly. The restaurant is very eclectically decorated and before I knew it...More
